entry.sentence: Only the birds were singing and rejoicing , as if they had to announce to the world that it was spring - and peace , a peace , of course , in which the peoples did not yet want to believe and which they disturbed themselves again by party hatred and strife .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (RB Only) (DT the) (NNS birds)) (VP (VBD were) (VP (VP (VBG singing)) (CC and) (VP (VBG rejoicing) (, ,) (SBAR (RB as) (IN if) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBD had) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB announce) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NN world))) (SBAR (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBD was) (NP (NP (NN spring)) (: -) (CC and) (NP (NP (NN peace)) (, ,) (NP (DT a) (NN peace)) (, ,) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (NN course)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHPP (IN in) (WHNP (WDT which))) (S (NP (DT the) (NNS peoples)) (VP (VBD did) (RB not) (ADVP (RB yet)) (VP (VB want) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB believe))))))))))))))) (CC and) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (NP (PRP they)) (VP (VBN disturbed) (NP (PRP themselves)) (PP (ADVP (RB again)) (IN by) (NP (NN party) (NN hatred) (CC and) (NN strife)))))))))))))))) (. .)))
